consent.title: Consent
consent.content: Your skill may collect personal information to provide better recommendations.

description.value: Get personalized diet advice and meal plans based on your height, age, sex, and weight.

en-US.name: Daily Diet Coach
en-US.summary: Get personalized diet advice and meal plans.
en-US.description: The Daily Diet Coach skill helps you with personalized diet advice based on your height, age, sex, and weight. You can also access daily diet tips and weekly meal plans.
